nodes.text: Benoni Ulte was an Ibhaan'I shaman, or Bronwen, who lived apart from his tribe as tradition dictated. Settling in Vakeyya to learn more about his Corellian ancestors, Ulte visited new arrivals to Soco-Jarel Spaceport. Ulte became the caretaker of the painting "Tejha Larel", which depicted the Lady Cjaalysce. The painting had been discovered by Pret Swain's fatherin the ruins of Cjaalysce'I. The painting was accompanied by the shadow of the spirit of the late Jedi Iann Doaba, Cjaalysce's lover, haunting the painting.
